body: The alpha of a pack assigns leadership roles as she sees fit.
name: Gnoll War Leaders

sections.other_gear: mwk chain shirt, mwk composite longbow (+4 Str) with 20 arrows, spear, c l oak of resistance +1
sections.feats: Endurance, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Rapid Shot, Weapon Focus (longbow)

sections.body: The lowest of gnoll war leaders, sergeants are always eager to prove their mettle in order to move up in the dominance hierarchy of the pack.

sections.name: Gnoll Sergeant
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Gnolls/Example Gnolls/Gnoll War Leaders/Gnoll Sergeant
sections.combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, tanglefoot bag

sections.ac: 20, touch 11, flat-footed 19 (+7 armor, +1 Dex, +1 natural, +1 shield)
sections.other_gear: mwk splint mail, mwk light steel shield, +1 scorpion whip, mwk javelin, cloak of resistance +1, 15 gp
sections.feats: Dazzling Display, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (whip), Improved Whip Mastery, Intimidating Prowess, Power Attack, Weapon Focus (whip), Whip Mastery

sections.body: During Combat The gnoll lieutenant demoralizes foes and lashes out with his scorpion whip from a distance.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Gnoll lieutenants use intimidation and the crack of their scorpion whips to push lesser members of the pack into battle and to demoralize their enemies.

sections.name: Gnoll Lieutenant
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Gnolls/Example Gnolls/Gnoll War Leaders/Gnoll Lieutenant
sections.combat_gear: potions of cure light wounds (2), potion of cure moderate wounds, alchemist's fire (3), thunderstones (2)
